collections.highertaxon: Aquatic plants, bryophytes, lichens, and macroalgae
collections.description: Aquatic macroalgae voucher collected as part of the NEON clip harvest protocol conducted annually at wadeable streams and 3 times at rives and lakes. Archived in 2% glutaraldehyde.

collections.highertaxon: Aquatic plants, bryophytes, lichens, and macroalgae
collections.description: Aquatic macroalgae voucher collected three times annually as part of the NEON point count protocol conducted at wadeable streams. Archived in 2% glutaraldehyde.

Unsorted bulk microalgae sample collected as part of the NEON periphyton, seston, and phytoplankton collection protocols conducted three times annually. Archived in 2% high-iodine Lugol's solution (seston and phytoplankton) or 0.5% glutaraldehyde (epipsammon, epipelon, epiphyton, epilithon, epixylon).
Freeze-dried unsorted bulk microalgae sample collected as part of the NEON periphyton, seston, and phytoplankton collection protocols conducted three times annually.
Unsorted bulk microalgae sample collected as part of the NEON periphyton, seston, and phytoplankton collection protocols conducted three times annually. Archived on microscope slides.
Particulate collection filter (Whatman 1851-8531 quartz microfiber filters) typically deployed for two weeks in a HiVol 3000 collector and archived at 4 degrees Celsius.
Dry soil coring sample conducted to a maximum depth of 30 ± 1 cm and collected every 5 years.
Wet deposition sample automatically collected with an optical precipitation sensor every two weeks and archived at 4 degrees Celsius.

collections.fullname: NEON Invertebrate Voucher Collection at Arizona State University
collections.description: Pinned invertebrate reference collection specimens for NEON invertebrate bycatch samples for the development of site-level invertebrate species checklists.
Sorted chironomids collected as part of the NEON benthic macroinvertebrate sampling protocols conducted 3 times annually. Archived in 70-95% ethanol.

Genomic extract from homogenized bulk macroinvertebrates collected as part of the second of three annual NEON benthic macroinvertebrate sampling events. Used for metabarcoding and archived at -80 degrees C .
Slide-mounted invertebrate specimens collected as part of the NEON benthic macroinvertebrate sampling protocols conducted 3 times annually.
Sorted oligochaetes collected as part of the NEON benthic macroinvertebrate sampling protocols conducted 3 times annually. Archived in 70-95% ethanol.
Taxonomic reference specimen used for identification of species in NEON benthic macroinvertebrates samples. Archived in 70-95% ethanol.

Subsample of bulk macroinvertebrates collected as part of the NEON benthic macroinvertebrate sampling protocol conducted three times annually. Each subsample contains at least 300 identified specimens and is archived in 95% ethanol.

Bulk unsorted macroinvertebrates collected as part of the first and third three annual NEON benthic macroinvertebrate sampling events. Oligochaetes and chironomids have been removed. Archived in 70-95% ethanol.

Carabid vouchers collected in a pitfall trap trap deployed for approximatately 2 weeks as per the NEON carabid sampling protocol. Archived in 95% ethanol and pooled across traps from the same plot and sampling dates.

Genomic extract from the leg of a pinned carabid voucher collected in a pitfall trap trap deployed for approximatately 2 weeks as per the NEON carabid sampling protocol. Used for barcoding and archived at -80 degrees C.
Pinned Carabid voucher collected in a pitfall trap trap deployed for approximatately 2 weeks as per the NEON carabid sampling protocol.
Carabid vouchers collected in a pitfall trap trap deployed for approximatately 2 weeks as per the NEON carabid sampling protocol. Archived in 95% ethanol and not pooled across traps.

Bulk unsorted invertebrate bycatch collected in a pitfall trap trap deployed for approximatately 2 weeks as per the NEON carabid sampling protocol Carabids and vertebrates have been removed. Remaining samples are archived in 95% ethanol and pooled across traps from the same plot and sampling dates.

Bulk unsorted invertebrate collected as bycatch in a pitfall trap trap deployed for approximatately 2 weeks as per the NEON carabid sampling protocol. Carabids and vertebrates have been removed. Remaining samples are archived in 95% ethanol and not pooled across traps.
Single-species bulk mosquito sample collected as part of the NEON CO2 mosquito trapping protocol conducted every 2-4 weeks for 2 nights. Archived in liquid nitrogen.
Bulk unsorted mosquito sample collected as part of the NEON CO2 mosquito trapping protocol conducted every 2-4 weeks for 2 nights. Archived in liquid nitrogen.

Genomic extract from the leg of a pinned mosquito voucher collected as part of the NEON CO2 mosquito trapping protocol conducted every 2-4 weeks for 2 nights. Used for barcoding and archived at -80 degrees C.

Aqueous whole genomic DNA from 10-50 homogenized conspecific female mosquitoes collected as part of the NEON CO2 mosquito trapping protocol conducted every 2-4 weeks for 2 nights. Used for pathogen testing and archived at -80 degrees C.
Pinned mosquito voucher collected as part of the NEON CO2 mosquito trapping protocol conducted every 2-4 weeks for 2 nights conducted every 2-4 weeks for 2 nights.
Aqueous whole genomic DNA from a single tick nymph collected as part of the NEON tick sampling protocol. Used for pathogen testing and archived at -80 degrees C.

Genomic extract from homogenized bulk zooplankton samples collected as part of the NEON zooplankton sampling protocol conducted 3 times annually at lakes. Used for metabarcoding and archived at -80 degrees C .

Unsorted bulk zooplankton sample collected as part of the NEON zooplankton sampling protocol conducted 3 times annually at lakes. Subsamples for taxonomic identification have been removed. Archived in 70% ethanol.
Taxonomic reference specimen used for identification of species in NEON bulk zooplankton samples. Archived in 70-95% ethanol.
Unsorted bulk zooplankton sample collected as part of the NEON zooplankton sampling protocol conducted 3 times annually at lakes. Archived in 70% ethanol.

Genomic extracts from bulk benthic microbes collected as part of NEON benthic microbe sampling protocols conducted 3 times annually at wadeable streams. Used for metabarcoding and archived at -80 degrees C.
Bulk benthic microbes collected as part of NEON benthic microbe sampling protocols conducted 3 times annually at wadeable streams. Archived on Sterivex SVGP capsule filters at -80 degrees C.

Bulk soil subsample collected from up to 30 cm depth as part of NEON terrestrial soil sampling protocols conducted 3 times annually. Soil sample was homogenized across 3 samples taken from a single plot. Archived in liquid nitrogen.

Genomic extracts from a bulk soil microbe sample collected from up to 30 cm depth as part of NEON terrestrial soil sampling protocols conducted annually. Soil sample was homogenized across 3 samples taken from a single plot. Used for metabarcoding and archived at -80 degrees C.

Genomic extracts from bulk surface water microbes collected as part of NEON surface microbe sampling protocols conducted 12 times annually at wadeable streams and 6 times annually at lakes and rivers. Used for metabarcoding and archived at -80 degrees C.

Bulk surface water microbes collected as part of NEON surface microbe sampling protocols conducted 12 times annually at wadeable streams and 6 times annually at lakes and rivers. Archived on Sterivex SVGP capsule filters at -80 degrees C.

collections.highertaxon: Aquatic plants, bryophytes, lichens, and macroalgae
collections.fullname: Aquatic Plant, Bryophyte, Lichen and Macroalgae Collection (Herbarium Vouchers [Standard Sampling])
collections.description: Dry herbarium voucher specimen collected as part of the NEON aquatic clip harvest protocol conducted annually at wadeable streams and 3 times annually at rivers and lakes.

collections.highertaxon: Aquatic plants, bryophytes, lichens, and macroalgae
collections.fullname: Aquatic Plant, Bryophyte, Lichen, and Macroalgae Collection (Herbarium Vouchers [Clip Harvests])
collections.description: Dry herbarium voucher specimen collected as part of the NEON aquatic point count protocol conducted 1-3 times annually at wadeable streams.

collections.highertaxon: Aquatic plants, bryophytes, lichens, and macroalgae
collections.fullname: Aquatic Plant, Bryophyte, Lichen, and Macroalgae Collection (Herbarium Vouchers [Point Counts])
collections.description: Dry herbarium voucher specimen collected as part of the NEON aquatic standard sample protocol conducted 3 times annually at wadeable streams.
Sample of belowground biomass collected as part of the NEON megapit soil sampling protocol that occurred once at the initiation of the site. Archived dried and ground at room temperature.

Sample of belowground biomass collected at a maximum depth of 30 cm as part of the standard NEON terrestrial plant biomass survey protocols conducted every five years. Only live biomass is archived and stored dried and ground at room temperature.

Canopy foliage sample from a single species at sites dominated by woody tree cover or bulk herbaceous biomass clips at sites dominated by herbaceous vegetation. Samples collected every five years as part of the NEON canopy foliage protocols. Stored dried and ground at room temperature.
Terrestrial plant herbarium voucher collected during NEON plant diversity survey protocols conducted 1-2 annually.
Leaf tissue sample collected from an individual of a focal NEON phenological survey species. Archived at -80 degrees C.

Sample of litterfall (shed leaves and needles, reproductive parts, and fine woody debris with butt-end diameter < 2 cm) collected from elevated traps as part of the standard NEON litterfall survey protocols conducted every five years at forested sites. Archived dried and ground at room temperature.
NULL

Genomic extract from a fin clip of a fish collected from NEON electrofishing, gill-nets or mini-fyke nets protocols implemented twice annually in wadeable streams and lakes. Archived at -80 degrees C.

Fish voucher collected as an incidental mortality from NEON electrofishing, gill-nets or mini-fyke nets protocols implemented twice annually in wadeable streams and lakes. Fixed in 10% buffered formalin preservative and then transferred to 70% ethanol or isopropanol for long-term storage.

collections.fullname: Herptile Voucher Collection (Ground Beetle Sampling Bycatch Archive Pooling)
collections.description: Herptile voucher collected as bycatch in a pitfall trap trap deployed for approximatately 2 weeks as per the NEON carabid sampling protocol. Archived in 95% ethanol and pooled across traps from the same plot and sampling dates.

collections.fullname: Herptile Voucher Collection (Ground Beetle Sampling Bycatch Trap Sorting)
collections.description: Herptile voucher collected as bycatch in a pitfall trap trap deployed for approximatately 2 weeks as per the NEON carabid sampling protocol. Archived in 95% ethanol and not pooled across traps.

collections.fullname: Herptile Voucher Collection (Small Mammal Sampling Bycatch)
collections.description: Herptile voucher collected as an incidental bycatch mortality during NEON small mammal box trapping and archived in 95% ethanol.
Blood sample from a small mammal collected as part of the NEON small mammal box trapping protocol conducted for 3 nights 4-6 times annually. Archived in liquid nitrogen.

Aqueous whole genomic DNA from small mammal ear tissue and blood samples collected as part of the NEON small mammal box trapping protocol conducted for 3 nights 4-6 times annually. Used for pathogen testing and/or barcoding and archived at -80 degrees C.
Ear tissue punch sample from a small mammal collected as part of the NEON small mammal box trapping protocol conducted for 3 nights 4-6 times annually. Archived in liquid nitrogen.
Fecal sample collected from a small mammal as part of the NEON small mammal box trapping protocol conducted for 3 nights 4-6 times annually. Archived in liquid nitrogen.
Hair and/or whisker sample collected from a small mammal as part of the NEON small mammal box trapping protocol conducted for 3 nights 4-6 times annually. Archived at -80 degrees C.

collections.fullname: Mammal Collection (Vouchers [Ground Beetle Sampling Bycatch Archive Pooling])
collections.description: Mammal voucher collected as bycatch in a pitfall trap trap deployed for approximatately 2 weeks as per the NEON carabid sampling protocol. Archived in 95% ethanol and pooled across traps from the same plot and sampling dates.

collections.fullname: Mammal Collection (Vouchers [Ground Beetle Sampling Bycatch Trap Sorting])
collections.description: Mammal voucher collected as bycatch in a pitfall trap trap deployed for approximatately 2 weeks as per the NEON carabid sampling protocol. Archived in 95% ethanol and not pooled across traps.

Small mammal voucher collected incidentally from a standard diversity plot as part of the NEON small mammal box trapping protocol conducted for one night 4-6 times annually. Prepared as a study skin and skull (or full skeleton) or archived in 95% ethanol.

Small mammal voucher collected incidentally from a pathogen plot as part of the NEON small mammal box trapping protocol conducted for 3 nights 4-6 times annually. Prepared as a study skin and skull (or full skeleton) or archived in 95% ethanol.
